long_description: This dark, narrow, L-Shaped corridor is covered in several metal plates along the walls.  There are a few niches in the wall which each contain a clay urn placed on the floor.  There is a horrendous overwhelming stench.  In the far northwest corner, there lies a single skeleton dressed in aged clothing and rusted armor.  On his head is a rusted, yet sturdy helmet.
short_description: This is the hallway containing a lantern and clothed skeleton that has something on it's head.

Lantern.name: Lantern
Lantern.description: This can be lit with hero's torch.

Skeleton.name: Skeleton
Skeleton.description: This skeleton has something on it's head, looks like a helmet.
